document_data.name: Elbruin Hammertree
document_data.mainbody: '''Elbruin Hammertree''' was an explorer from [[Baldur's Gate]] on the [[Sword Coast]] in the late 13{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/55/The Everwinking Eye: A Closer Look at Maskyr's Eye|25}}
document_data.History: In the late 1280s DR, Elbruin led an expedition into the [[Earthspur Mountains]] in [[the Vast]] in order to look for a way around the [[Glacier of the White Worm]]. There, they encountered and destroyed a large insectoid creature that walked upright and was armed with a [[spear]], which they identified as an "[[gelugon|ice daemon]]". The event contributed to legends of the glacier being kept cold by fell [[magic]].
